allProjects.title: JobsHubGlobal
allProjects.description: JobsHubGlobal is a online job portal website where sers can create account as a job seeker or employer. Employers can post jobs and search for candidates by resumeJobseekers can find jobs and apply or bookmark the job they want.Job seekers can create resumes. It iss responsive for any devices

allProjects.title: Languagerian
allProjects.description: Languagerian is a educational website where user can create account either as a student or a teacher. Teachers can post language learning tutorial such as English, German, Italian, Spanish, Arabi etc. Contrary, students can browse for their desired language learning course and purchase the want they want.

allProjects.title: Solies Quiz
allProjects.description: This is a quiz website where users will be able to perform quiz and try to answer some questions about general knowledge. After each round they will get a score and see the level of their general knowledge.

allProjects.title: Olivia Chefs
allProjects.description: In this website the visitors can see a group of great well known chefs. Besides the chefs the visitors will be able to see their best recipes with their ingredients. Also this website is protected by Firebase, only the registered users can log in. Anyone can create a account here. This website is fully dynamic created with ReactJS. For server side we used Node and Express.

allProjects.title: Dragon News 24
allProjects.description: This is an amazing dynamic website built with ReactJS where visitors can read news from different of categories like national, international, sports, business and you name it. Users can dynamically sort the newsfeed and read their desired news.

allProjects.title: Area Calculator
allProjects.description: With this tool the users can easily calculate their area. It is like an geometry application. The user can just enter their values such like the base and the height and tool will calculate it.

allProjects.title: News Portal
allProjects.description: This is an amazing website built with HTML, CSS and Javascript where visitors can read news from different of categories like national, international, sports, business and you name it. Users can dynamically sort the newsfeed and read their desired news.

allProjects.title: Holistic Family
allProjects.description: Discover a comprehensive medical website dedicated to providing reliable health information. From expert articles to interactive tools, empower yourself with knowledge and make informed decisions for your well-being and that of your loved ones.

allProjects.title: Mexant Design
allProjects.description: Unlock the potential of your online presence with our web development service website. From captivating designs to seamless functionality, we craft tailored solutions that drive engagement, enhance user experience, and elevate your digital success to new heights.

allProjects.title: Toy Bank
allProjects.description: This app is amazing and fun. there is a nice dashboard and it has a few section like for deposite money, withdrawing money etc. A user can enter a number and click on the deposite button and it will show the total deposite balance. The user can simply do the same with withdrawing money. If they enter a number for withdrawing then it will decrease this amount from the total balance.

allProjects.title: G3 Architect
allProjects.description: Step into the world of architectural excellence on our company website. Immerse yourself in our stunning portfolio, showcasing visionary designs and impeccable craftsmanship. From residential to commercial projects, our architect group combines creativity.

allProjects.title: Legal Solution
allProjects.description: Welcome to our law solution firm's website, where legal expertise meets client-centered solutions. Explore our range of services, tailored to protect your rights and navigate complex legal challenges with confidence and efficiency. Trust us to be your steadfast legal partner.

allProjects.title: Jobs Hub
allProjects.description: In this website the visitors can find their desired jobs they are looking from. This website showcase jobs from different of companies and the users can click on them and see their description based on their ID. In fact, the users can select a specific job and take it to the cart to buy.
